import {Component, OnInit} from '@angular/core'; import {HardwareService} from "../../services/hardware.service"; @Component({ selector: 'app-hardwares', templateUrl: './hardwares.component.html', styleUrls: ['./hardwares.component.css'] }) export class HardwaresComponent implements OnInit{ hardwares: any = []; constructor(private hardwareService : HardwareService){} ngOnInit(): void { this.hardwareService.onHardwaresChange.subscribe((hardwares) =>{ // console.log("hardwares",hardwares); this.hardwares = hardwares; }) } //get hardware btn // getHardwares() { // this.hardwareService.getHardwares(); // } }
